page.description: Returns .t. if a table is empty. You can pass in the name of a table, or a pointer to an open table.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .F. = Table is not empty, .T. = Table is empty.

argument.name: table
argument.description: The name of an Alpha Table table.

page.discussion: The TABLE_IS_EMPTY() function determines whether a table contains any records.
page.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? table_is_empty(tbl) = .F.
